meanings.definition: To grow old or show signs of aging
meanings.sent1: My dog seems to senes faster than I do.
meanings.sent2: The tree in our yard started to senes with each passing year.

meanings.sent4: Time seemed to senes the old building, giving it a charming, weathered look.
